item.description:
C'est un experiment-

La soirée de conversation françaiseva  commencer avec un pique-nique parmi les jardins de Elizabeth Park.  This is a two-event evening.  We begin with a pot-luck picnic in the park during one of their free outdoor concerts.  We will sit far back so that the music will be in the background.  If it happens to be pouring rain, the picnic will not take place.

The group will also meet at 7PM at Panera as usual.

 

 

Le pique-nique est «potluck« so bring something that you'd like to eat or drink, and a bit to share.  You might want to also bring a chair.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Pique-nique!
